content.rendered:
Directed by Amit Roy.

Written by Navjot Gulati. Navjot Gulati. Amit Roy. Amit Roy.

Cast Arsh Bajwa(Cyberjeet). Taapsee Pannu(Nimmi). Richa Meena(Neha Sinha). Amit Sadh(Ram Bharose). Inder Pal Singh(Muktiar Gill – Lawyer). Brijendra Kala(Ram Bharose’s Uncle). Aakash Arora(Nimi’s Friend). Kirron Arya(Doctor Kirron). Saahir Banwait(Tanny). Arvinder Bhatti(Shopkeeper). Aman Kaur Dheer((as Aman Dheer)). Shikha Malhotra(Aarshi). Neeta Mohindra(Nimmi’s Mother). Prakriti Nautiyal(College friend). Gyan Ranjan(Lalu). Abhishek Sharma(Raj (as Raj)). Pratyush Uday(Amit sinha (as Pratyush Singh))

Language Hindi.

Producers Shivaji Dasgupta. Ashutosh Goswami. Ronnie Lahiri. Shoojit Sircar.

Production Crouching Tiger Motion pictures.
